snippet.title: AFK Arena Story Trailer
snippet.description: AFK Arena is a casual action card game. Players can build up a personalized team and level up with the unique AFK Awards auto farming system. Join players all over the world in this journey of fantasy and prevent an ancient evil from destroying the realm of Esperia.

localized.title: AFK Arena Story Trailer
localized.description: AFK Arena is a casual action card game. Players can build up a personalized team and level up with the unique AFK Awards auto farming system. Join players all over the world in this journey of fantasy and prevent an ancient evil from destroying the realm of Esperia.
